sources.title: Wholly Smoke (1938)
sources.description: A neighborhood bully convinces Porky to take a puff from his cigar, causing Porky to hallucinate a smoke-man named Nick O’ Teen, along with a musical number done by cigars, cigarettes and pipes in the likeness of the 3 Stooges, etc This is a Computer Colorized version from 1990.

metadata.Plot: A neighborhood bully convinces Porky to take a puff from his cigar, causing Porky to hallucinate a smoke-man named Nick O. Teen, along with a musical number done by cigars, cigarettes and pipes in the likeness of the 3 Stooges, etc.
metadata.Actors: Mel Blanc, The Sing Band, Paul Taylor Group
